--- title: Alistair Bailey execute: echo: false message: false warning: false about: id: hero-heading template: solana image: "img/avatar.jpg" image-shape: round image-width: 13em links: - text: "{{< iconify fa6-brands:bluesky size=2em title='Bluesky'>}}" aria-label: "Bluesky" href: https://bsky.app/profile/ab604.uk target: _blank - text: "{{< iconify bi github size=2em title='GitHub' >}}" aria-label: "Github" href: https://github.com/ab604 target: _blank - text: "{{< iconify simple-icons:orcid size=2em title='ORCiD' >}}" aria-label: "ORCiD" href: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0023-8679 target: _blank - text: "{{< iconify academicons:google-scholar size=2em title='Google Scholar' >}}" href: https://scholar.google.co.uk/citations?user=Xq7lwXEAAAAJ&hl=en target: _blank aria-label: "Google Scholar" --- ::: {.cell} ::: :::{#hero-heading} ### Biography An engineer by training, my research career has been as a scientist and informatician investigating antigen processing and presentation by major histocompatibility molecules using multi-omics methods.

I currently work as a learning technologist supporting Librarians at the [University of Southampton.](https://www.soton.ac.uk) ### Interests My most recent project was [CRUK Accelerator: Improving immunotherapy treatment for cancer patients.](https://www.cancerresearchuk.org/funding-for-researchers/accelerator-award/portfolio-funded-projects-outputs) Other projects have included research into influenza, COVID-19, skin sensitization to chemical allergens, asthma and contagious cancer in the Tasmanian Devil. I am also a [Data and Software Carpentry](https://carpentries.org/) instructor. ### Education {{< iconify lets-icons:mortarboard-light size=1.75em title="PhD in Immunology 2013 University of Southampton" >}} PhD in Immunology 2013
University of Southampton {{< iconify lets-icons:mortarboard-light size=1.75em title="BEng in Civil Engineering 2008 University of Southampton">}} BEng in Civil Engineering 2008
University of Southampton {{< iconify lets-icons:mortarboard-light size=1.75em title="BTEC ND in Audio-Visual Production 1994 Bournemouth & Poole College of Art & Design">}} BTEC ND in Audio-Visual Production 1994
Bournemouth & Poole College of Art & Design :::
